name: Primal Oozer
movement: 30 ft. walking, 10 ft. climbing, 20 ft. swimming
description: A formidable ooze-like aberration with a slimy body, capable of climbing and swimming.
memorable: Inflicts ooze plague disease, which can turn victims into ochre jelly.
goals: Hunts and infects creatures with its disease.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other oozes or related aberrations.
environment: Typically found in damp, dark places, such as caves or swamps.
strengths: High Strength for powerful melee attacks; can move through various terrains.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma; struggles in social situations.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with bite, dealing slashing damage and potential acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Ooze Plague can drastically weaken foes and turn them into new oozes.
senses: Possesses darkvision to navigate in darkness effectively.
skills: Has average Dexterity, aiding its movement and avoidance during battles.
additional_information: Damage immunity to acid helps it resist common attacks.
Can inflict Acidic Slime damage when touched or hit in melee.
Has Pack Tactics for advantageous positioning in combat.
Advantage on escape checks due to Slimy Body ability.
Low passive perception but good Wisdom.
test_queries: ooze-like creature that infects with disease
menacing slime monster that causes ooze plague
slimy creature that can swim and climb
monster that turns victims into ochre jelly
